content:
pattern is available as a pdf here 1 **from pattern description **

this pattern makes a nubby dishcloth thicker and more stable than plain garter stitch chinese waves is one of my favorite pattern stitches i use it for edgings and for textured stripes interspersed with stockinette i like it so much it s actually pictured in the left border throughout my web site 1 http //www maggiesrags com/dishcloth pdf
